title: VICHYIE Women Mock Neck Ribbed Bodycon Dress Long Sleeve Mini Pencil Dresses

COMFY TO WEAR:This Long-Sleeved Women Dress Is Made Of Soft And Stretchy Soft Ribbed Knit Fabric Gives You a Super Soft Wearing Comfort. You Can Really Snuggle Up In The Comfy Material - Regardless Of Whether You'Re Spending The Day Off On The Couch Or You'Re Out.

BASIC DRESS:This Lady's Ribbed Dress With Slight Fuzzy Inner Can Be Worn Alone As A Tunic Or A Mini Dress In Fall. And Can Be Worn With Your Various Fashionable Outerwear In Winter. The Above Knee Length Makes Prolonged The Legs Length. Warm Mock Neck For A Streamlined Silhouette.
White Marks Disappear After Washed:Gentle Mashine Wash In Cold Water/Hand Wash Is The Best/Do Not Use Bleach/Lay Flat To Dry. Please Wash Dark Clothes And Light Colors Separately To Avoid Staining.
